info.title: File Explorer
info.description: Use this in order to provide an environment to explore files / folders in a directory.

prop.name: rootPath
prop.description: Path of the folder to display as root, starting from within the WWW folder

prop.name: rootFriendlyName
prop.description: The friendly name for the root folder.

prop.name: showHidden
prop.description: If set to true the fileExplorer manipulates hidden files as well. (Set allways to true at the moment)

prop.name: readOnly
prop.description: If set to true the fileExplorer will operate in read only mode; no creation nor deletion is allowed.

prop.name: fileTypes
prop.description: Mapping of file types and extensions.

prop.name: domTypes
prop.description: Mapping of file types and dom representations.

prop.name: iconifyTypes
prop.description: Extensions of files that can become icons

method.name: __construct
method.description: Constructor Method. Creates and initializes a fileExplorer.

parameter.name: $rootPath
parameter.description: Path of the folder to display as root. Relative to system root

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: FileExplorer's id.

parameter.name: $friendlyRootName
parameter.description: The friendly name for the root folder.

parameter.name: $showHidden
parameter.description: If set to true the fileExplorer will handle hidden files as well. (Currently set to always true)

parameter.name: $readOnly
parameter.description: If set to true the fileExplorer operates in read only mode

method.name: build
method.description: Builds and returns the fileExplorer object. (Use fileExplorer::get to acquire the object's wrapper)

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: If a subpath is supplied during build, the fileExplorer will be initialized at that path.

method.returndescription: The fileExplorer object

method.name: getDirectoryContents
method.description: Creates and returns the file viewing area

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: The path of the directory contents to display, relative to the fileExplorer's rootPath.

method.returndescription: An array that contains the contents list

method.name: getSessionPath
method.description: Acquires a rootPath from session, associated to a rootIdentifier.

parameter.name: $rootIdentifier
parameter.description: Unique identifier for each fileExplorer.

method.returndescription: The associated root path

method.name: isReadOnly
method.description: Returns if the fileExplorer with the given id operated in read only mode

parameter.name: $rootIdentifier
parameter.description: The id of the fileExplorer. Must be unique!

method.returndescription: Returns true if the fileExplorer runs in read only mode.

method.name: getRootFriendlyName
method.description: Acquires a rootFriendlyName from session, associated to a rootIdentifier.

parameter.name: $rootIdentifier
parameter.description: Unique identifier for each fileExplorer.

method.returndescription: The associated root friendly name

method.name: createFolder
method.description: Creates a folder.

parameter.name: $folderName
parameter.description: The name of the folder

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: The subpath of the folder to create, relative to the fileExplorer's rootPath

method.returndescription: The status of creation

method.name: getFileSize
method.description: Aqcuires the size of a file.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: Name of the file

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: Subpath to the file, relative to the fileExplorers rootPath

method.returndescription: The file size, viewed in the closest unit possible (KB, MB, ...)

method.name: renameFile
method.description: Renames a file or folder.

parameter.name: $path
parameter.description: Path to the directory of the file / folder.

parameter.name: $oldName
parameter.description: Name of the file / folder to be renamed.

parameter.name: $newName
parameter.description: New name of the file / folder.

method.returndescription: The status of rename

method.name: moveUploadedFile
method.description: Move an uploaded file to a fileExplore inner folder.

parameter.name: $uploadedFilePath
parameter.description: The uploaded file path.

parameter.name: $filePath
parameter.description: The new file path, relative to the file explorer root path.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: drop
method.description: Deletes files / folders (folders need to be empty). Returns an array with the statuses.

parameter.name: $fileNames
parameter.description: Holds the names of the files / folders

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: Holds the subPath of the files / folders, relative to the fileExplorer's rootPath

method.returndescription: An array with the statuses of the files

method.name: moveFiles
method.description: Moves files to a new location under the root path. Returns an array with the statuses.

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: Path from the root folder till the source containing folder

parameter.name: $fileNames
parameter.description: Holds the paths of the files / folders in the source folder

parameter.name: $destination
parameter.description: Destination folder under the root path.

method.returndescription: An array with the statuses of the files

method.name: copyFiles
method.description: Copies files to a new location under the root path. Returns an array with the statuses.

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: Path from the root folder till the source containing folder

parameter.name: $fileNames
parameter.description: Holds the paths of the files / folders in the source folder

parameter.name: $destination
parameter.description: Destination folder under the root path.

method.returndescription: An array with the statuses of the files

method.name: createTempCopy
method.description: Builds and returns a folder tree view according to the root path.

parameter.name: $files
parameter.description: Path to the file or array with paths to files to copy/pack in temp area

method.returndescription: The folderView

method.name: getInvalidRoot
method.description: To be called in case of undefined rootPath (usually undefined in session)
method.returndescription: Returns DOMElement holding proper message

method.name: getDOMRepresentation
method.description: Get a DOM representation of a file's contents. Returns DOMElement on success, NULL if the file is missing, FALSE if the file type is not supported.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: Name of the file.

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: Path where the file exists, relative to the fileExplorer's rootPath

method.returndescription: Returns a DOM elements representing a file's contents on success, NULL if the file is missing, or FALSE if the file type is not supported.

method.name: getBase64Representation
method.description: Encodes a file's contents in base64 format and returns an array with the appropriate mime-type and source string.

parameter.name: $contents
parameter.description: The contents of the file.

method.returndescription: An array with the appropriate mime-type and source string.

method.name: getStateTile
method.description: Get a tile that presents a state

parameter.name: $msg
parameter.description: The message that is presented in the tile.

parameter.name: $state
parameter.description: The state that the tile represents (empty, invalid, ...)

method.returndescription: The state tile

method.name: getFileType
method.description: Identifies a file's type

parameter.name: $filename
parameter.description: The name of the file

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: The subpath relative to the fileExplorer's root

parameter.name: $extensionOnly
parameter.description: If set to TRUE, the extension of the file will be returned

method.returndescription: Returns the file type or NULL if not recognized.

method.name: getDomType
method.description: Identifies a files dom representation

parameter.name: $filename
parameter.description: The subpath relative to the fileExplorer's root

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: The subpath relative to the fileExplorer's root

method.returndescription: Returns the appropriate representation element

method.name: isIconified
method.description: Check if the given extension belongs to a file type that can be iconified.

parameter.name: $extension
parameter.description: A given file extension.

method.returndescription: Returns TRUE if the file with the given extension can be iconified.

method.name: isImage
method.description: Check if the given extension belongs to a generic image type.

parameter.name: $extension
parameter.description: A given file extension.

method.returndescription: True if extension is image, false otherwise.

method.name: setPath
method.description: Set file explorer's root path

parameter.name: $rootPath
parameter.description: Path to directory that will become the fileExplorer's root

method.name: getPath
method.description: Get file explorer's root path.
method.returndescription: The rootPath

method.name: isExecutable
method.description: Checks whether a given filename is executable based on the extension. It includes all major web extensions like php, aspx, jsp etc.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The file name to check.

method.returndescription: True if executable, false otherwise.

method.name: getToolArea
method.description: Build and get tools area (upload, add, delete, etc..)
method.returndescription: The tools area

method.name: getPathArea
method.description: Build and get path area.

parameter.name: $subPath
parameter.description: If a subPath is supplied the path area will be initialized at that path

method.returndescription: The path area

method.name: getMessageArea
method.description: Creates and returns a message area for the file explorer with some of its messages. Something like a message pool.
method.returndescription: The message area

method.name: getPreferencesArea
method.description: Returns the preferences area wrapper.
method.returndescription: The DOMElement that holds the fileExplorer preferences

method.name: getUploadArea
method.description: Creates the uploading area
method.returndescription: The DOMElement representing the uploading area.

method.name: getNotificationsArea
method.description: Returns the notifications that the fileExplorer may need.
method.returndescription: The DOMElement that holds the fileExplorer notifications.
